item.description:
November 2, 2009

HI!

Peace and blessings on you and your loved ones!

I hope this note of mine finds you well, with peace and joy in your heart. The weather is still nice, the work on the house keeps me busy... life is hectic most of the time, but God is good and I cannot complain.

I am looking forward to our upcoming INTERFAITH BOOK CLUB gathering. Mark you calendar:

TIME: November 15, 2009 at 4:00PM
PLACE: PEACE ABBEY - Two North Main Street, Sherborn, MA 01770

In order to keep our conversation and sharing focused, we continue our reflection on MATTHEW FOX's book: "ONE RIVER, MANY WELLS". CHAPTER THREE: "JOY, SUFFERING, BEAUTY..." (pages 254-372).

We are always enriched by the presence of each other... by our common sharing and reflection.

See you all on the 15th...

May heaven enable us to be bridge builders and not obstable makers...

PEACE
Fr. Joe, sx
St. Francis Xavier Missionaries

(508) 429-2144
pino.ma@gmail.com
item.name: INTERFAITH BOOK CLUB
